known_issues: Navbar/header logo appears too small; needs increased height (desktop 48–56px, mobile 36–40px) with no extra padding shrink, vertically aligned with Login button, preserve aspect ratio, and use clean SVG only.

existing_features.title: Update the navbar logo rendering in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` so the logo appears larger in the header: set the logo image height to be within 36–40px on mobile and 48–56px on desktop, while preserving aspect ratio (no stretching).

Ensure the navbar logo is not visually reduced by extra padding or a constrained parent container: the logo’s displayed height must match the intended CSS height (not shrunk due to padding, line-height, or container constraints), and the logo remains vertically aligned with the Login/Logout button in the header.
Use only the clean SVG logo asset for the header logo (no raster/PNG logo usage in the navbar), keeping the existing SVG path as the source of truth.

projectName: Increase navbar logo size and alignment in header
